title: Scenario 6 - User's assignments: Role1/BASIC + Role2/SPECIFIC (granted) + Role3/CHALLENGED (Region 123), R2AP mappings: Role1 + Role2 + Role 3 -> AP1 + AP2 + AP3, Authorised Case/State: AP1 + AP2 (state: Created only) + AP3 will return Access Granted: `BASIC,CHALLENGED`
specs: a caseworker with RA1: BASIC + RA3: CHALLENGED (Region 123) role assignment
uses the case-reference of the case just created
contains `Access Granted` set to `BASIC,CHALLENGED` [Due to AP2 not being authorised for case state]
